about_the_game:
AutoBulletSurvivor


Jump right into the world of AutoBulletSurvivor! This thrilling roguelike game challenges you to survive on a post-apocalyptic surface devastated by nuclear war. As the protagonist, you must collect items on the surface and evade increasingly powerful enemies to stay alive.

The surface has been laid waste by nuclear war. The few remaining normal humans have taken refuge underground, creating shelters. You must venture to the surface to gather necessary supplies for the shelter. Grow stronger with the items you collect in this perilous environment.

  • Survival on the Surface: Strategize to survive against increasingly powerful foes.
  • Item Farming: Collect a variety of items to sell or enhance for growth.
  • Shelter Supply: Gather essential supplies for the underground shelter and trade with residents for greater rewards.
  • Pixel Art Style: Explore the apocalyptic world with unique pixel art graphics.
  • Random Skills: Collect random skills to enhance your survival on the surface.

The player's goal is to collect various items on the surface, level up, and become stronger. Gather more items to enhance yourself and survive battles against enemies.

Experience the thrill of survival in AutoBulletSurvivor and become the ultimate survivor in a world devastated by nuclear war!

name: AutoBulletSurvivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Jump into the world of AutoBulletSurvivor! Survive on a post-apocalyptic surface devastated by nuclear war. Collect items, evade powerful enemies, and gather supplies for the underground shelter. Grow stronger with each run and experience the thrill of survival.
